runs.comm: bowls it full, swings it in, Rohit tucks it through midwicket for his first runs
now bowls the outswinger and this is wide outside off, teasing the batsman, but Rahane lets it go through
now this one tails in, smart bowling from Kula. Rahane gets solidly behind it and defends to off
he looks to whip this to the leg side, but gets a leading edge right in the gap between the cover and the point fielder.. they come back for an easy couple
keeps it outside off and gets this one to dart away a touch, the batsman plays a loose punch as is beaten
he shuffles across the stumps and clips the fuller delivery to deep backward square leg to keep the strike
just back of length outside off, Rahane looks to steer it to the off side but chops it down near the stumps
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to cover

big strike first up! Rahane tries to break the pattern with a across the line slog to a back of length delivery, it comes slow off the deck and catches the underedge on to his thigh pads, it goes on to disturb the stumps.
tries a short delivery first up but this sails over outside off, Kohli lets it go
he comes forward and punches the length delivery to cover
waits in the crease and dabs the back of length delivery to wide mid on for a single
oh what wrists! He takes a step down the pitch and whips this inswinging delivery through midwicket, all along the ground
he takes a positive forward stride and pushes this length delivery to mid-off
that almost kisses the outside edge! Kula is always a dangerous bowler. After bringing the last two in, this one straightens and beats the bat
he comes forward and punches the length delivery firmly, but hits it to short cover
well fielded by Herath at short fine leg.. He saves a certain boundary there. Kohli had just tried to clip it past him
he comes forward and then opens the face to steer this length delivery down to third man
targets the stumps with his dibbly-dobblies, Rohit tucks it through midwicket for an easy single
stays in the crease and picks up a single at backward point with a dabbed shot
he comes forward and defends the fuller delivery to Dilshan at point
waits a little bit extra, then opens the face of the bat very late to guide this to third man
another single to third man, India happy picking up the singles at the moment
he tries to chop this through point but it's not short enough, beats the bat
he goes deep in the crease and clips the flatter delivery from off stump to deep midwicket

tries a quicker delivery, but he ends up dropping it too short! Rohit quickly gets on top of that and smacks it over deep square leg. He gets worried with the height for a bit, but that just drops before the boundary
now he sweeps this from outside off, he is not in control as there is a bit of bottom edge, but he manages to beat the short fine leg fielder
tossed up and full on off, the batsman pushes it straight to midwicket

almost a chance of run out at non-striker's! This was hit straight to Malinga at square leg but Rohit was already halfway down..The throw just bounced a bit awkwardly for the bowler..Would have been tricky
some turn on this one, cramps Kohli for room as he looks to cut this, but he manages to chop it behind point
starts off with a length delivery outside off, Rohit uses his most profitable shot, a steer to third man, to get off strike
another length delivery around off stump, Kohli dabs it towards midwicket to pick up an easy single
slower delivery, the batsman watches it carefully and nudges it to short fine leg for another single
short and wide outside off, Kohli just opens the face to run it down to third man
bowls this length ball a touch slower, but the batsman defends it easily to midwicket
whack! this one is full enough and Rohit, Malinga's Mumbai captain, is not fazed. He gets under it and punches it firmly past the non-striker. That was hit hard

dropped, how costly is that going to be! Malinga at midwicket is not able to hold on to over head stinger..It was marginally short and Kohli went for the pull straightaway, but didn't get the elevation
he comes forward and defends this to the off side
allows it to come in before nudging it behind square on the leg side
he comes forward and pushes it to long off for a single
he comes down the pitch to a fuller delivery and drives it to deep midwicket
pretty one! He comes down the pitch and easily launches it over wide long-off with an inside out drive.. The fielder was there, but he clears him by a fair margin.
bowls that back of length line and stays accurate, Rohit works it away to deep midwicket
fuller delivery, that is punched firmly to the off side but Sena dives to his left and prevents the single
slower from Mathews, the batsman pushes it to midwicket with soft hands and charges down for a single but the fielder from long on keeps them to one..
where has this gone! The batsman makes room to flatbat this down the ground, but gets it high on the bat and ends up lobbing it over the umpire's head
slower delivery again, the batsman wrists it away to midwicket for a single
he waits on the back foot and pushes it softly towards midwicket for another single
he comes down the pitch immediately and plays a crisp drive down to long off, just a single there
he looks to drive this to off, but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
looks to move down the leg side but the bowler follows him there, it clips the pads and they take a leg bye
comes down the pitch again and almost yorker himself with that one, manages to dig it out towards mid on
comes down the pitch again and Herath fires it into his pads, Kohli pushes it straight to midwicket
fuller and a touch quicker, the batsman has no space to get under it, he punches it to long on
bowls an offcutter on the stumps, the batsman turns it to midwicket for a single
he looks to slog it across the line, but gets it from the bottom half of his bat, manages to hit it as far as deep midwicket for a single
he comes down the pitch and pushes the slower delivery down to long on
this time he manages to thread the boundary on off side! He makes room and gets a fuller delivery outside off, that's perfect for him as he slices it through point powerfully
goes across the stumps to ramp it to fine leg but gets hit on the pads.. The impact was well outside off .. It was infact off the gloves

slower ball, but this one is full enough and now Kohli goes for a big slog! He hasn't got all hit bat behind it but he manages to beat the fielder at deep midwicket. For a moment, he would have been interested, but it clears him in the end
comes down the pitch but Herath shortens his length, he has to defend
a loud appeal for lbw as the batsman misses his slog, but this one was just going down the leg side

soft dismissal! Rohit makes room and looks to drive through cover but he neither tries to go over nor tries to keep it down, plays it straight into the hands of short cover. That's a good low catch by Sena there.  Not the first time he has been out like this..
flatter delivery on the pads, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg  for a single
he punches this straight to midwicket again
smartly bowled from Herath! He fires it in as he sees the batsman move down the pitch, Kohli can only push it back at him
tossed up outside off, there is some turn for Sena here, Yuvraj nudges it to short third man for a quick single
the batsman pushes this flatter delivery straight to midwicket
comes down the pitch and chips it over the non-striker's head, still poor timing from Kohli and long on comes around and cuts it off
this is beautifully timed! After all those deliveries he finds this one fly off the middle of the bat. He comes down the pitch and creams this over extra cover
stays in the crease and defends this to midwicket
flexes his arms and drives it powerfully to deep cover for a single
he is finding his timing now! He is so quick on his feet, comes down the pitch and hammers it flat down the ground for a six.. no chance for any fielder there
he slows the pace down this time and the batsman can only push it to cover
fires it down the leg side, it's too far down
again uses his feet but is not to the pitch of the ball, pushes it to long off calmy
flatter and slower on the middle and leg line, the batsman defends it back towards the bowler
flatter and quicker outside off, Yuvraj turns the strike over with a dab to short third man
that is too short from Herath, but that doesn't bounce much.. Kohli pulls it along the ground, straight to deep midwicket
fires it full outside off, the batsman punches it down to long off, his hand coming off the handle as he plays that
back of length delivery outside off, Yuvraj won't mind this.. he calmly steers it down to third man to give strike to Kohli
this is nicely driven to deep extra cover, all along the ground, for a couple. It was full and it was wide outside off too
it's full but it's too wide, easily punched to deep cover for a single that brings yet another half-century for Kohli. he keeps working like a well-oiled machine..
full and on the stumps, but not quite a yorker, gives Yuvraj some space to squeeze it out to deep cover

full and too wide! Malinga is getting the length right but the line is completely off.. This is too wide and all Kohli has to do is get some bat on it, which he does, to pick up a boundary to third man
he comes down the pitch but is beaten by the length and turn, manages to get some bat on it as he pushes it to off
flighted delivery, he drives it straight to cover
slower and tossed up, it's on the pads and Yuvraj manages to whip it behind square on the leg side for a single
flatter and quicker on the pads, the batsman gets down on his knees and dabs it to short fine leg
flatter and quicker on off, Yuvraj comes forward and defends
comes down the pitch but still can't get the ball away, gets hit on the pads as the bowler fires it in
fuller on off, Kohli doesn't want to wait, he thwacks this over wide long-on with ease! This is the ideal pace for him, a lot of bottom hand in that one
follows it up with a murderous drive through cover.. The fielder couldn't get down in time.. hits it so hard this Kohli, using all timing and a lot of wrists

this could be a drop here! Sena at deep midwicket misjudges this one.. It was a slower delivery and the batman went for a full-blooded pull, he doesn't get much timing.. Sena comes in a touch and it clears him.. poor judgement from the fielder
this one is hammered down the ground.. What violence! Thisara does well at long on to keep this one in..
now Yuvi brings out a crisp drive to deep extra cover off a full delivery, a single only this time
a good response from Kula! bowls a good yorker outside off and Kohli fails to make contact
short and wide, he cuts it and finds the man at point
makes room to punch this through off, but it bounces a touch extra and beats the bat.. and the top of off
this time he comes down and thumps it back at the bowler, who sticks his hand out to his right, but cannot hold on to a tough chance
he comes down the track and punches this firmly to long on
here comes the slog sweep, but the bowler slowed it down.. Yuvraj get a bottom edge to the leg side
he comes down the pitch and punches it to midwicket where Dilshan's fumble allows a single
this is a good yorker now! Just outside off and Kohli can only dig it out to extra cover for a single
another good yorker outside off, Yuvi looks to guide it to off but gets a bottom edge to the keeper
he comes down the pitch and manages to get some bat this time, squeezes this to third man
takes a step down and drives it beautifully through cover, where Thiri makes an excellent diving save..
another yorker outside off, again Yuvi fails to get bat on it.. This is embarrassing for the batsman. Some frustration in the dug out as well
comes down the pitch and drives this full delivery off the toe end to deep cover for a single. He keeps the strike

a full toss is hit straight to long-off! Not sure if Sri Lanka really wanted that wicket at this stage. A relief for the Indian bench though. A man in form could have hit this ball anywhere, but Yuvraj chips it straight to the fielder
full and wide outside off.. Kohli was shaping to play a sweep but adjusts late to guide it to third man
another full and wide outside off, Dhoni punches it down to long on with a cross-batted shot
this is good bowling! He keeps it full and wide outside off, Kohli stretches but can't reach it.. this is inside the marker too
another one wide outside off, very wide.. Kohli manages to take it on the full, but can only slice it to deep point

this hits the toe off the batsman and this was almost as wide outside off as it can be, shows you how Dhoni was trying to play some kind of a sweep.. They pick up a single to third man.. But this is excellent stuff from Kula
they can't get a bat on it.. This is full and wide and it slips under the bat
this one is fired full and wide, a bit too wide this time
this one is closer to the off stump and slips under the bat again as Dhoni looks to play the helicopter.. But this beats the keeper too and they come back for a second
beautiful bowling! Dhoni looks for the helicopter, but this is a good yorker outside off, it slips under the bat again
wonderful yorker, this time the batsman gets some bat on it, but can only push it as far as midwicket.. they come back for two.. so no Kohli in the last over..
full and wide.. it's only a single as Dhoni digs it out to cover to give Kohli the last ball
another good yorker, the batsman comes back for the second after pushing it to midwicket, but he was always struggling and direct hit ends his innings
